scripts.shoot: rm -rf __screenshots__ && SCREENSHOT_MODE=local jest && mv __screenshots__/Guitar/"Desktop - coco-snap.png" ../react-guitar-theme-coco/screenshot.png && mv __screenshots__/Guitar/"Desktop - dark-snap.png" ../react-guitar-theme-dark/screenshot.png && mv __screenshots__/Guitar/"Desktop - default-snap.png" ../react-guitar/screenshot.png
